doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: before 1750; alteration: 1899; alteration: 1900; alteration: 1920s; alteration: circa 1972

Wayland Park--Dr George Gilmer (1742-1795), Jefferson's physician, and wife Lucy Walker Home--William Wirt, Biographer of Patrick Henry & Monroe's Attorney General of US, and wife Mildred Gilmer, eldest Daughter of Dr. George Gilmer, resided here in 18th century--John H Craven Home 1810--William Hotopp Home 1866
Frame I-House with Center Gable + 1 Story Frame, H-Plan, Bulkhead, 2 Ramp Chimney, 5 Bay, Store, Vineyards
survey data: Mutual Assurance Society Insurance Policy
Barn destroyed by lightning--Hotopp Wine Cellar burned--House burned--House razed
